% DHBW Report Template - Main Document

\documentclass[
  fontsize=12pt,
  paper=A4,
  twoside=false,
  listof=totoc,
  bibliography=totoc,
  titlepage,
  headsepline
]{scrreprt}

\input{config/preamble}

\begin{document}

% Title page
\include{frontmatter/titlepage}

% Front matter with Roman numerals
\newcounter{savepage}
\pagenumbering{Roman}

\include{frontmatter/abstract}
\include{frontmatter/declaration}

% Conditional confidentiality notice
\ifthenelse{\boolean{is-confidential}}
    {\include{frontmatter/confidential}}
    {}

% Auto-generated lists
\tableofcontents
\include{frontmatter/abbreviations}
\listoffigures
\listoftables

\renewcommand{\lstlistlistingname}{Listings}
\lstlistoflistings

\setcounter{savepage}{\value{page}}

% Main content with Arabic numerals
\cleardoublepage
\pagenumbering{arabic}
\rmfamily
\onehalfspacing

% Chapters - add new chapters here
\include{content/chapter1}

% Appendices
\include{appendix/appendix}

% Bibliography
\printbibliography[title=Bibliography]

\end{document}
